description:
Ataru has a new nemesis in the classroom and Lum`s got a plan to set things straight. The strife in the classroom doesn`t end there, as moms from all over town (and the galaxy) wreak havoc at parent-teacher conference time!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aa Kojin Kyouju / Senritsu no Sankanbi
Le mie lezioni private - Brividi di terrore
Oh, Lonely Teacher! First appearance of Kuribayashi Sensei / Terrible Inspection Day
あゝ個人教授 - 戦りつの参観日
